verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּיָ֨הּ ׀ <WH1984> Praise הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
מִ֗י <WH4310> Who יְ֭מַלֵּל <WH4448> Who can utter גְּבוּר֣וֹת <WH1369> the mighty acts יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ <WH8085> show כָּל־ <WH3605> all תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> deep

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> [are] they that keep מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> judgment עֹשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> [and] he that doeth צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> righteousness בְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵֽת׃ <WH6256> at all times

זָכְרֵ֣נִי <WH2142> Remember יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> me O LORD בִּרְצ֣וֹן <WH7522> with the favour עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> [that thou bearest unto] thy people פָּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי <WH6485> O visit בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> me with thy salvation

לִרְא֤וֹת ׀ <WH7200> That I may see בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת <WH2896> the good בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ <WH972> of thy chosen לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ <WH8055> that I may rejoice בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <WH8057> in the gladness גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ <WH1471> of thy nation לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל <WH1984> that I may glory עִם־ <WH5973> with נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5159> with thine inheritance
חָטָ֥אנוּ <WH2398> We have sinned עִם־ <WH5973> like אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> with our fathers הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ <WH5753> we have committed iniquity הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <WH7561> we have done wickedly

אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ <WH1> Our fathers בְמִצְרַ֨יִם ׀ <WH4714> in Egypt לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ <WH7919> understood נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH6381> not thy wonders לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not זָ֭כְרוּ <WH2142> they remembered אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣ב <WH7230> not the multitude חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <WH2617> of thy mercies וַיַּמְר֖וּ <WH4784> but provoked עַל־ <WH5921> by יָ֣ם <WH3220> [him] at the sea בְּיַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> [even] at the Red

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <WH3467> Nevertheless he saved לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the sake שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> them for his name's לְ֝הוֹדִ֗יעַ <WH3045> to be known אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1369> sake that he might make his mighty power

וַיִּגְעַ֣ר <WH1605> He rebuked בְּיַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֭וּף <WH5488> the Red וַֽיֶּחֱרָ֑ב <WH2717> also and it was dried up וַיּוֹלִיכֵ֥ם <WH1980> led בַּ֝תְּהֹמ֗וֹת <WH8415> them through the depths כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> as through the wilderness

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <WH3467> And he saved מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> them from the hand שׂוֹנֵ֑א <WH8130> of him that hated וַ֝יִּגְאָלֵ֗ם <WH1350> [them] and redeemed מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> them from the hand אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> of the enemy
וַיְכַסּוּ־ <WH3680> covered מַ֥יִם <WH4325> And the waters צָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6862> their enemies אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> there was not one מֵ֝הֶ֗ם <WH1992> like לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נוֹתָֽר׃ <WH3498> of them left
וַיַּאֲמִ֥ינוּ <WH539> Then believed בִדְבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> they his words יָ֝שִׁ֗ירוּ <WH7891> they sang תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> his praise
מִֽ֭הֲרוּ <WH4116> They soon שָׁכְח֣וּ <WH7911> forgat מַעֲשָׂ֑יו <WH4639> his works לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not חִ֝כּ֗וּ <WH2442> they waited לַעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6098> not for his counsel
וַיִּתְאַוּ֣וּ <WH183> But lusted תַ֭אֲוָה <WH8378> exceedingly בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וַיְנַסּוּ־ <WH5254> and tempted אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> God בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <WH3452> in the desert
וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And he gave לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> them שֶׁאֱלָתָ֑ם <WH7596> them their request וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> but sent רָז֣וֹן <WH7332> leanness בְּנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> into their soul
וַיְקַנְא֣וּ <WH7065> They envied לְ֭מֹשֶׁה <WH4872> Moses בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> also in the camp לְ֝אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> [and] Aaron קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the saint יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

תִּפְתַּח־ <WH6605> opened אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> The earth וַתִּבְלַ֣ע <WH1104> and swallowed up דָּתָ֑ן <WH1885> Dathan וַ֝תְּכַ֗ס <WH3680> and covered עַל־ <WH5921> and עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> the company אֲבִירָֽם׃ <WH48> of Abiram
וַתִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> was kindled אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> And a fire בַּעֲדָתָ֑ם <WH5712> in their company לֶ֝הָבָ֗ה <WH3852> the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <WH3857> burned up רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> the wicked
יַעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> They made עֵ֥גֶל <WH5695> a calf בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <WH2722> in Horeb וַ֝יִּשְׁתַּחֲו֗וּ <WH7812> and worshipped לְמַסֵּכָֽה׃ <WH4541> the molten image

וַיָּמִ֥ירוּ <WH4171> Thus they changed אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹדָ֑ם <WH3519> their glory בְּתַבְנִ֥ית <WH8403> into the similitude שׁ֝֗וֹר <WH7794> of an ox אֹכֵ֥ל <WH398> that eateth עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <WH6212> grass
שָׁ֭כְחוּ <WH7911> They forgat אֵ֣ל <WH410> God מוֹשִׁיעָ֑ם <WH3467> their saviour עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> which had done גְדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> great things בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> in Egypt
נִ֭פְלָאוֹת <WH6381> Wondrous works בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חָ֑ם <WH2526> of Ham נ֝וֹרָא֗וֹת <WH3372> [and] terrible things עַל־ <WH5921> and יַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> by the Red

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Therefore he said לְֽהַשְׁמִ֫ידָ֥ם <WH8045> that he would destroy לוּלֵ֡י <WH3884> them had not מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> Moses בְחִיר֗וֹ <WH972> his chosen עָמַ֣ד <WH5975> stood בַּפֶּ֣רֶץ <WH6556> him in the breach לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> to turn away חֲ֝מָת֗וֹ <WH2534> his wrath מֵֽהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> lest he should destroy
וַֽ֭יִּמְאֲסוּ <WH3988> Yea they despised בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land חֶמְדָּ֑ה <WH2532> the pleasant לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <WH539> they believed לִדְבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> not his word
וַיֵּרָגְנ֥וּ <WH7279> But murmured בְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH168> in their tents לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <WH8085> [and] hearkened בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> not unto the voice יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> Therefore he lifted up יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> his hand לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like לְהַפִּ֥יל <WH5307> against them to overthrow א֝וֹתָ֗ם <WH853> בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> them in the wilderness
וּלְהַפִּ֣יל <WH5307> To overthrow זַ֭רְעָם <WH2233> their seed בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> also among the nations וּ֝לְזָרוֹתָ֗ם <WH2219> and to scatter בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> them in the lands
וַ֭יִּצָּ֣מְדוּ <WH6775> They joined לְבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר <WH1187> themselves also unto Baalpeor וַ֝יֹּאכְל֗וּ <WH398> and ate זִבְחֵ֥י <WH2077> the sacrifices מֵתִֽים׃ <WH4191> of the dead
וַ֭יַּכְעִיסוּ <WH3707> Thus they provoked [him] to anger בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4611> with their inventions וַתִּפְרָץ־ <WH6555> brake in בָּ֝֗ם מַגֵּפָֽה׃ <WH4046> and the plague
וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> Then stood up פִּֽ֭ינְחָס <WH6372> Phinehas וַיְפַלֵּ֑ל <WH6419> and executed judgment וַ֝תֵּעָצַ֗ר <WH6113> was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָֽה׃ <WH4046> and [so] the plague
וַתֵּחָ֣שֶׁב <WH2803> And that was counted ל֭וֹ לִצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> unto him for righteousness לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> unto all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <WH1755> generations עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> evermore

וַ֭יַּקְצִיפוּ <WH7107> They angered עַל־ <WH5921> at מֵ֥י <WH4325> [him] also at the waters מְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4808> provocation וַיֵּ֥רַע <WH3415> so that it went ill לְ֝מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> with Moses בַּעֲבוּרָֽם׃ <WH5668> their account
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because הִמְר֥וּ <WH4784> Because they provoked אֶת־ <WH853> רוּח֑וֹ <WH7307> his spirit וַ֝יְבַטֵּ֗א <WH981> so that he spake unadvisedly בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ <WH8193> with his lips

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הִ֭שְׁמִידוּ <WH8045> They did not destroy אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> the nations אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after אָמַ֖ר <WH559> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> they
וַיִּתְעָרְב֥וּ <WH6148> But were mingled בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the heathen וַֽ֝יִּלְמְד֗וּ <WH3925> and learned מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <WH4639> their works
וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> And they served אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH6091> their idols וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> became לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> which were a snare
וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ <WH2076> Yea they sacrificed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּ֭נֵיהֶם <WH1121> their sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1323> and their daughters לַשֵּֽׁדִים׃ <WH7700> unto devils

וַיִּֽשְׁפְּכ֨וּ <WH8210> And shed דָ֪ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֡י <WH5355> innocent דַּם־ <WH1818> [even] the blood בְּנֵ֘יהֶ֤ם <WH1121> of their sons וּֽבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1323> and of their daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Whom זִ֭בְּחוּ <WH2076> whom they sacrificed לַעֲצַבֵּ֣י <WH6091> unto the idols כְנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַתֶּחֱנַ֥ף <WH2610> was polluted הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> and the land בַּדָּמִֽים׃ <WH1818> with blood
וַיִּטְמְא֥וּ <WH2930> Thus were they defiled בְמַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH4639> with their own works וַ֝יִּזְ֗נוּ <WH2181> and went a whoring בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> with their own inventions

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> kindled אַ֣ף <WH639> Therefore was the wrath יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> against his people וַ֝יְתָעֵ֗ב <WH8581> insomuch that he abhorred אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> his own inheritance
וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <WH5414> And he gave בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen וַֽיִּמְשְׁל֥וּ <WH4910> them ruled בָ֝הֶ֗ם שֹׂנְאֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8130> and they that hated
וַיִּלְחָצ֥וּם <WH3905> also oppressed אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <WH341> Their enemies וַ֝יִּכָּנְע֗וּ <WH3665> them and they were brought into subjection תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under יָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> under their hand

פְּעָמִ֥ים <WH6471> times רַבּ֗וֹת <WH7227> Many יַצִּ֫ילֵ֥ם <WH5337> did he deliver וְ֭הֵמָּה <WH1992> however יַמְר֣וּ <WH4784> them but they provoked בַעֲצָתָ֑ם <WH6098> [him] with their counsel וַ֝יָּמֹ֗כּוּ <WH4355> and were brought low בַּעֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> for their iniquity
וַ֭יַּרְא <WH7200> Nevertheless he regarded בַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> their affliction לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like בְּ֝שָׁמְע֗וֹ <WH8085> when he heard אֶת־ <WH853> רִנָּתָֽם׃ <WH7440> their cry

וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר <WH2142> And he remembered לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> for them his covenant וַ֝יִּנָּחֵ֗ם <WH5162> and repented כְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> according to the multitude [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <WH2617> favour ק)
וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> He made אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> לְרַחֲמִ֑ים <WH7356> them also to be pitied לִ֝פְנֵ֛י <WH6440> of כָּל־ <WH3605> of all שׁוֹבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7617> all those that carried them captives

הוֹשִׁיעֵ֨נוּ ׀ <WH3467> Save יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> us O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God וְקַבְּצֵנוּ֮ <WH6908> and gather מִֽן־ <WH4480> at הַגּ֫וֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> us from among the heathen לְ֭הֹדוֹת <WH3034> to give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH6944> unto thy holy לְ֝הִשְׁתַּבֵּ֗חַ <WH7623> [and] to triumph בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> in thy praise

בָּר֤וּךְ־ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֪י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> From הָ֤עוֹלָ֨ם ׀ <WH5769> from everlasting וְעַ֬ד <WH5704> even הָעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> to everlasting וְאָמַ֖ר <WH559> say כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and let all the people אָמֵ֗ן <WH543> Amen הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
